short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This gluten-free detector clearly highlights whether a product is gluten-free or not on selected UK food retailer sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nuuglu’s gluten-free detector allows you to easily see which products are gluten-free on selected food retailer websites. To use this plugin, simply visit a product page on a food retailer’s site, and then click the Nuuglu icon in  your toolbar. The plugin will then highlight whether this item is gluten-free or not.

Please see the final screenshot for a full list of supported food retailers in the UK.

If you would like us to include a specific food retailer or have any further feedback, then please email us at: info@nuuglu.co.uk

Thank you for viewing this page!
